campaign_brief:
Campaign Summary:
This campaign promotes basketball memorabilia and collectible card game releases, highlighting autographed basketball gear, rare rookie cards, and new drops like Pok√©mon Destined Rivals and Magic the Gathering x Final Fantasy. It also features a limited-time auction of autographed sports collectibles, encouraging customers to shop, pre-order, or bid to enhance their collections.

Countries:
US

Audience/Target Demographic:
Collectible enthusiasts ‚Äî basketball memorabilia, collectible card games (Pok√©mon, Magic the Gathering), sports auctions

Summary of Requests:
What are you requesting? Copy
Develop copy for one subject line, one pre-header, and five modules corresponding to hero and banner images with promotional messaging, including disclaimers where applicable.

Modules:

Module 1:
Primary message: All-time greats for your lineup
Secondary message: Bring the playoff heat home. Don‚Äôt miss out on autographed basketball gear, rare rookie cards, and more.
Disclaimer: N/A
Notes: Hero module emphasizing exclusivity and breadth of basketball collectibles; encourage immediate shopping.
Include: Basketball memorabilia
URLs:
- https://www.ebay.com/vlp/collectibles

Module 2:
Primary message: Big alliances. Bigger battles.
Secondary message: Team Rocket vs. Trainers‚Äîpick a side with Pok√©mon Destined Rivals.
Disclaimer: N/A
Notes: Promote pre-orders for Pok√©mon card drop; build excitement for the release.
Include: Pok√©mon Scarlet and Violet Destined Rivals
URLs:
- https://www.ebay.com/sch/i.html?_nkw=Pok%C3%A9mon+Scarlet+and+Violet+Destined+Rivals&_sacat=261044&_from=R40&_trksid=p2334524.m570.l1313&_udlo=10&_odkw=MGT+Final+Fantasy&\_osacat=261044

Module 3:
Primary message: MTG x Final Fantasy is here
Secondary message: Saddle up your chocobo for this highly anticipated drop.
Disclaimer: N/A
Notes: Highlight Magic the Gathering x Final Fantasy collectible card release with pre-order CTA.
Include: Magic the Gathering x Final Fantasy
URLs:
- https://www.ebay.com/sch/261044/i.html?_nkw=MGT+Final+Fantasy&_from=R40&\_udlo=10

Module 4:
Primary message: The signature says it all
Secondary message: Go all in with autographed finds from Inscriptagraphs.
Disclaimer: Ends 6/8.
Notes: Urgency added with auction end date; promote autographed sports memorabilia auction bids.
Include: Inscriptagraphs autographed collectibles
URLs:
- https://www.ebay.com/e/sports-fan-shop/collectibles-auction-hub

Design Considerations:
N/A

Copy Considerations:
- Use clear, value-first, and friendly tone.
- Avoid excessive punctuation or all-caps.
- Focus on specificity and verifiable claims.
- Emphasize urgency only where auction end date is specified.
- Maintain concise, engaging language suitable for collectible enthusiasts.
- Avoid sustainability or greenwashing terms.

Legal Requirements:
Include the auction end date as indicated: "Ends 6/8." for the Inscriptagraphs auction module.
All other legal disclaimers are N/A.

URLs ‚Äì Rank in Priority:
1. https://www.ebay.com/vlp/collectibles
2. https://www.ebay.com/sch/i.html?_nkw=Pok%C3%A9mon+Scarlet+and+Violet+Destined+Rivals&_sacat=261044&_from=R40&_trksid=p2334524.m570.l1313&_udlo=10&_odkw=MGT+Final+Fantasy&\_osacat=261044
3. https://www.ebay.com/sch/261044/i.html?_nkw=MGT+Final+Fantasy&_from=R40&\_udlo=10
4. https://www.ebay.com/e/sports-fan-shop/collectibles-auction-hub

Product Recommendations ‚Äì Rank in Priority:
1. Basketball memorabilia
2. Pok√©mon Scarlet and Violet Destined Rivals
3. Magic the Gathering x Final Fantasy
4. Inscriptagraphs autographed collectibles
llm_input:
[
  {
    "moduleId": "0",
    "prompts": [
      {
        "role": "system",
        "content": "
# Content Generation Task

## Role
You are an expert email copywriter trained in clear, impactful and concise content for an email layout component based on a provided outline, layout details, and additional context. Follow the instructions carefully to ensure the content is unique, engaging, polished, professional and aligned with the overall email strategy.

## General Requirements
1. Adhere to Layout Schema: The content must strictly follow the provided layout schema. Do not alter the structure, remove elements, or change element names
2. Ensure each 'text' and 'richtext' element's content is within its specified max-length (this is a hard limit). Aim to fill the available space with suitable content
3. Avoid repetition and do not repeat or reuse phrases to keep the email engaging and varied
4. Use sentence case for all generated content: capitalize ONLY the first word of each sentence and proper nouns (brands, names, people) only, even in CTA and title elements
5. Do not use more than one exclamation mark per module. 1 is not a target but a maximum
6. No emojis unless explicitly stated
7. Module 0 is always subject line and preheader; Module 1 is always an attention-grabbing hero module

Do not include any explanations, notes, or additional text outside of the JSON structure.

## Data Type Handling
For elements with data type "text":
- Generate suitable text content, taking into account the type, tone, maxLength and avoiding generic stock phrases, and add a value property containing this text
- CTA elements should be concise and actionable, with a maximum of 3 words

For elements with data type "richtext":
- Generate suitable text content and format using Markdown syntax, taking into account the type, tone, maxLength and avoiding generic stock phrases, and add a value property containing this text
- Use newlines if necessary
- NEVER use bold markdown syntax
- NEVER use single-asterisk italics or lists
- NEVER add links unless they have been requested in the outline

For each element of type "image"
- Generate a suitable concise search prompt to find a relevant image, and add a value property containing this search prompt
- This value should be short and uniquely distinct, ensuring no two search prompts are exactly or even nearly the same

Do not include any explanations, notes, or additional text outside of the JSON structure.

## Input/output format example

**Input:**
Outline: "Hero Section: Introducing our new summer collection with vibrant styles"

Element Requirements:
[
  {
    "name": "headline",
    "type": "text",
    "maxLength": 50
  },
  {
    "name": "subline",
    "type": "text", 
    "maxLength": 100
  },
  {
    "name": "descriptionRichText",
    "type": "richtext",
    "maxLength": 200
  }
]

**Output:**
{
  "headline": "Content of the headline goes here",
  "subline": "Content of the subline goes here",
  "descriptionRichText": "For richtext elements\nUse newlines if necessary"
}
"
      },
      {
        "role": "user",
        "content": "
## Content Guidelines

## Tone of Voice
Apply a **friendly** tone consistently across all generated text to maintain a uniform style throughout the email

## List of elements
[{"name":"subjectLine","type":"text","maxLength":60},{"name":"preHeader","type":"text","maxLength":100}]

## Outline
Subject line: From the court to your collection üèÄ
Preheader: Find epic basketball memorabilia, plus hot card drops.
"
      }
    ],
    "timestamp": "2025-08-29T02:02:51.986Z"
  },

campaign_brief:
Campaign Summary:
This campaign promotes the launch of the highly anticipated 2025 Topps Baseball Series 2 trading cards, alongside exclusive collectibles from Goldin auctions, a new Lorcana card game set, and key legendary sports memorabilia auctions. It aims to drive conversions by showcasing fresh releases, rare items, and auction opportunities with an enthusiastic tone appealing to collectible enthusiasts.

Countries:
US

Audience/Target Demographic:
Collectible enthusiasts ‚Äî baseball trading cards, sports memorabilia, collectible card games

Summary of Requests:
What are you requesting? Copy
Create an email with subject line, pre-header, and five modules. 
Each module should have a primary message, secondary message, and disclaimers if applicable.

Modules:

Module 1:
Primary message: 2025 Topps brings the heat
Secondary message: The wait is finally over for the highly anticipated Baseball Series 2 release. Don‚Äôt miss the chance to pull modern legends and rising stars.
Disclaimer: N/A
Notes: Hero role module; drive excitement; include references to both legends and new stars.
Include: 2025 Topps Baseball Series 2 trading cards, baseball sports trading cards
URLs:
https://www.ebay.com/e/sports-fan-shop/sports-trading-card-new-releases

Module 2:
Primary message: Grails with a legacy
Secondary message: Bring home elite collectibles from the Goldin 100.
Disclaimer: N/A
Notes: Emphasize exclusivity; auction focus.
Include: Goldin 100 collectibles
URLs:
https://goldin.co/buy/?Auctions=202505-0919-4006-a0ab510c-b1a9-46c6-9b67-a96fc7cd6d34

Module 3:
Primary message: Restore balance to the realm of Lorcana
Secondary message: Defend the throne from darkness with the Reign of Jafar set.
Disclaimer: N/A
Notes: Promote collectible card game launch; use adventure/defense theme.
Include: Lorcana Reign of Jafar collectible card game
URLs:
https://www.ebay.com/e/toys/card-game-new-arrivals

Module 4:
Primary message: Top-shelf hits you can't pass up
Secondary message: Swing for the fences with these iconic collectibles.
Disclaimer: Don‚Äôt miss legendary Michael Jordan finds at the Upper Deck auction. Ends 6/22. Find rarities at the 4 Sharp Corners Select Showcase. Ends 6/29.
Notes: Promote two auctions; emphasize urgency (end dates).
Include: Michael Jordan memorabilia, Upper Deck auction, 4 Sharp Corners Select Showcase
URLs:
https://www.ebay.com/e/sports-fan-shop/collectibles-auction-hub

Design Considerations:
N/A

Copy Considerations:
Use clear, value-first, friendly, and concise tone matching eBay‚Äôs brand voice.
Avoid all-caps and spammy punctuation.
Avoid greenwashing or sustainability claims.
Ensure excitement around new trading card drops, exclusive auctions, and collectibles.
Respect module hierarchy and content structure.
Include event end dates as urgency cues.

Legal Requirements:
N/A

URLs ‚Äì Rank in Priority:
1. https://www.ebay.com/e/sports-fan-shop/sports-trading-card-new-releases
2. https://goldin.co/buy/?Auctions=202505-0919-4006-a0ab510c-b1a9-46c6-9b67-a96fc7cd6d34
3. https://www.ebay.com/e/toys/card-game-new-arrivals
4. https://www.ebay.com/e/sports-fan-shop/collectibles-auction-hub

Product Recommendations ‚Äì Rank in Priority:
1. 2025 Topps Baseball Series 2 trading cards
2. Goldin 100 collectibles
3. Lorcana Reign of Jafar card game
4. Michael Jordan memorabilia / Upper Deck auction / 4 Sharp Corners Select Showcase

Modules:  
Module 1:  
Primary message: 2025 Topps brings the heat  
Secondary message: The wait is finally over for the highly anticipated Baseball Series 2 release. Don‚Äôt miss the chance to pull modern legends and rising stars.  
Disclaimer: N/A  
Notes: Hero module; focus on broad appeal and excitement for new release.  
Include: 2025 Topps baseball cards  
URLs: https://www.ebay.com/e/sports-fan-shop/sports-trading-card-new-releases

Module 2:  
Primary message: Grails with a legacy  
Secondary message: Bring home elite collectibles from the Goldin 100.  
Disclaimer: N/A  
Notes: Auction emphasis; exclusive collectible items.  
Include: Goldin 100 collectibles  
URLs: https://goldin.co/buy/?Auctions=202505-0919-4006-a0ab510c-b1a9-46c6-9b67-a96fc7cd6d34

Module 3:  
Primary message: Restore balance to the realm of Lorcana  
Secondary message: Defend the throne from darkness with the Reign of Jafar set.  
Disclaimer: N/A  
Notes: Promote collectible card game; adventurous tone.  
Include: Lorcana Reign of Jafar  
URLs: https://www.ebay.com/e/toys/card-game-new-arrivals

Module 4:  
Primary message: Top-shelf hits you can't pass up  
Secondary message: Swing for the fences with these iconic collectibles.  
Disclaimer: Don‚Äôt miss legendary Michael Jordan finds at the Upper Deck auction. Ends 6/22. Find rarities at the 4 Sharp Corners Select Showcase. Ends 6/29.  
Notes: Promote two auctions with end dates; urgency tone.  
Include: Michael Jordan memorabilia, Upper Deck auction, 4 Sharp Corners Select Showcase  
URLs: https://www.ebay.com/e/sports-fan-shop/collectibles-auction-hub

## Role
You are an expert email copywriter trained in clear, impactful and concise content for an email layout component based on a provided outline, layout details, and additional context. Follow the instructions carefully to ensure the content is unique, engaging, polished, professional and aligned with the overall email strategy.

## General Requirements
1. Adhere to Layout Schema: The content must strictly follow the provided layout schema. Do not alter the structure, remove elements, or change element names
2. Ensure each 'text' and 'richtext' element's content is within its specified max-length (this is a hard limit). Aim to fill the available space with suitable content
3. Avoid repetition and do not repeat or reuse phrases to keep the email engaging and varied
4. Use sentence case for all generated content: capitalize ONLY the first word of each sentence and proper nouns (brands, names, people) only, even in CTA and title elements
5. Do not use more than one exclamation mark per module. 1 is not a target but a maximum
6. No emojis unless explicitly stated
7. Module 0 is always subject line and preheader; Module 1 is always an attention-grabbing hero module

Do not include any explanations, notes, or additional text outside of the JSON structure.

## Data Type Handling
For elements with data type "text":
- Generate suitable text content, taking into account the type, tone, maxLength and avoiding generic stock phrases, and add a value property containing this text
- CTA elements should be concise and actionable, with a maximum of 3 words

For elements with data type "richtext":
- Generate suitable text content and format using Markdown syntax, taking into account the type, tone, maxLength and avoiding generic stock phrases, and add a value property containing this text
- Use newlines if necessary
- NEVER use bold markdown syntax
- NEVER use single-asterisk italics or lists
- NEVER add links unless they have been requested in the outline

For each element of type "image"
- Generate a suitable concise search prompt to find a relevant image, and add a value property containing this search prompt
- This value should be short and uniquely distinct, ensuring no two search prompts are exactly or even nearly the same

Do not include any explanations, notes, or additional text outside of the JSON structure.

## Input/output format example

**Input:**
Outline: "Hero Section: Introducing our new summer collection with vibrant styles"

Element Requirements:
[
  {
    "name": "headline",
    "type": "text",
    "maxLength": 50
  },
  {
    "name": "subline",
    "type": "text", 
    "maxLength": 100
  },
  {
    "name": "descriptionRichText",
    "type": "richtext",
    "maxLength": 200
  }
]

**Output:**
{
  "headline": "Content of the headline goes here",
  "subline": "Content of the subline goes here",
  "descriptionRichText": "For richtext elements\nUse newlines if necessary"
}
"
      },
      {

## Tone of Voice
Apply a **friendly** tone consistently across all generated text to maintain a uniform style throughout the email
